content: Since crater runs happen for every beta do we have something that looks for major regressions in compile times? These kinds of issues often only get reported after a release.
crater is likely to be way too noisy (running on fairly over-subscribed shared servers), but no, we don't have anything like this today
I didn't even mean the small ones, more like seconds turning into minutes. cpu clocks instead of wall time to make things more comparable if there are concurrent builds.
